Welcome to my online Portfolio.

I am Mathew Lord and I'm graduating from the BSc(Hons)Computer Games Programming course at Staffordshire University in June. I am expecting to graduate a 2-1 or a first. I have experience working in as a developer at a mobile games company called Mobile Pie and spent a year working with them as part of my degree.

This site is a showcase of my work and a platform on which I can write blog posts about new technologies I am exploring or games I'm playing.
